text: Claudio Bonadio (1 February 1956 – 4 February 2020) was an Argentine judge. He was in charge of Federal Criminal and Correctional Court No. 11 from 1994 until his death. He was a critic of Presidents of Argentina Fernando de la Rúa, Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.Murió Claudio Bonadio, el juez federal que envió a juicio Cristina Kirchner Quién es Claudio Bonadio, el juez que puede encarcelar a los K más poderosos He was considered to be a key suspected of a car bomb attack against the Argentine Israel Mutual Association (AMIA)El día en que la comunidad judía en Argentina sufrió su peor atentado and was a key figure of the bribe scandal.El ABC de la causa “Cuadernos de la corrupción” Resolución del juez Bonadio que amplía el procesamiento de Cristina Fernández de Kirchner ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Argentine politicians Category:Argentine judges
title: Claudio Bonadio
